property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Little Bird to choose a character. Until the end of the phase that character gains (choose 1): an Intrigue icon, stealth, or infamy.

property.value: While Blackwater Bay Veteran has 1 or more power on it, it gains a Military Naval enhancement.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play Fleet from The Arbor by 3 if any opponent is running an agenda. Response: After Fleet from The Arbor is declared as a Naval attacker, choose another attacking character you control. Stand and remove that character from the challenge.

property.value: No attachments. Deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response : After you win a challenge in which Apostle of the Drowned God participated, discard the top card of the losing opponent's deck. If that card is a location, Apostle of The Drowned God claims 1 power.

property.value: Lower the cost to play Fleet from Pyke by 3 if any opponent is running an agenda. Response: After Fleet from Pyke is declared as a Naval attacker, choose another attacking character you control. Stand and remove that character from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play Lady Nym's Guard by 3 if any opponent is running an agenda. Response: Discard a card from your hand to cancel a card effect just triggered that chooses 1 of your Sand Snake characters as the only target.

property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Captain Groleo participated by 4 or more total STR, search your deck for an attachment and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Summer Sea Corsair comes out of Shadows, reveal 1 card from the top of your deck for each Smuggler character you control. Choose 1 revealed card and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle the rest back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you reveal Black Sails as your agenda, shuffle your deck and cut it into 2 stacks. Then, the opponent to your left chooses one stak to be The Hold, which is out of play. The other stack is your draw deck. Response: After you win a challenge in which you had at least 1 Naval attacker, choose 1 card from The Hold. At the end of the phase, add it to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if you are running the Black Sails agenda, reveal 1 character from The Hold and add it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each opponent must discard 1 power from a card he or she controls, if able. Then, if this your revealed plot card, trigger the 'when revealed' effect on the top River plot card in your used pile.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Captain. House Redwyne

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win initiative, add 2 gold tokens from the treasury to your gold pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Arbor Queen to choose a charatcter. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each gold token in your gold pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel Lionstar to move up 2 gold tokens from your gold pool on Lionstar. (Any number of gold tokens instead if you won a challenge with a participating Naval attacker this round.) Any phase: Kneel Lionstar to move any number of gold tokens from it to your gold pool.

property.value: Ironborn. Raider

property.value: Ironborn. House Harlaw

property.name: Text
property.value: Response : After Quentyn Martell is killed, claim 2 power for your House.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges : Kneel Meadowlark to choose a challenge icon. Each character in play loses all enhancements on that icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. only. When revealed, name a phase. Opponents cannot play event cards during that phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response : After Pentoshi Deckland has been declared as a Naval attacker lower the cost of the next character you put into play using Ambush this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a character enters play under your control, kneel Vhagar and kneel 1 influence to attach the topmost attachment in your discard pile to that character, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. During Power challenges your Army characters gain renown.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Epic Battle

property.name: Text
property.value: After the dominance phase this round there is an epic phase during which each player may initiate a single challenge of his choice. Characters with 1 or more Naval enhancements may be declared as attacker or defenders while kneeling. Instead of normal claim, the winner of each challenge may choose and take control of a location controlled by the loosing opponent. (Place this card next to your plot deck untile the end of this epic phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 2 during challenges in which you have declared a Naval attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Lancel Lannister gets +1 STR for each Holy character in play.

card.name: The Bear and the Maiden Fair

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an Intrgue challenge by 4 or more total STR, the losing opponent chooses and discards 2 cards from hand. (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: If you win a challenge as the attacker and the defending player does not have more participating characters than you, choose and kneel 1 character controlled by the losing opponent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ironborn. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Andrik the Unsmiling participated by 4 or more total STR, choose the topmost location in the losing player's discard pile and put it into play under your control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a character with 1 or more Naval enhancement to turn all Warship locations you control into characters with STR equal to their printed cost, a Military icon, and a Power icon, until end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: During unopposed challenges, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

property.value: When Oakenshield Port enters play put 6 gold tokens from the treasury on it. Response: After you win a challenge, discard 1 gold token from Oakenshield Port to claim 1 power for your House (discard 2 gold tokens to claim 2 power for your House instead if a Naval attacker or defender was participating in that challenge).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Power challenge by 4 or more total STR, stand all participating unique characters you control.

property.value: Response: After an opponent declares a Naval attacker against you, kneel Titan's Daughter to choose a standing character you control and kneel it as a defender. If you win the challenge, search you deck for a character, reveal it, and shuffle your deck. Then, put the revealed card on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent kneels a location, kneel Hellholt Docks to choose and kneel a location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge, discard your hand of at least 1 card to reveal the same number of cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your hand.

property.value: Lord. Traitor.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control 1 or more Dragon characters, House Targaryen Loyalist loses the Traitor trait and gains: "House Targaryen Loyalist gains renown during Power challenges."

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Balerion to lower the cost of the next character you put into play using ambush this phase by 1. That character claims 1 power when it comes into play and until the end of the phase, it gains a Naval enhancement on its Power icon, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a Targaryen character. That character gets +2 STR until the end of the phase. Then, attach Fire and Blood to that character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text, 'Attached character gains cannot be discarded from play').

property.name: Traits
property.value: Military Battle. City.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no other City plots in your used pile, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during Military challenges.

property.value: Intrigue Gambit. City.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have no other City plots in your used pile, choose an opponent. You and that opponent may each choose to shuffle your hands of at least 1 card into your decks, and replace them with the top 5 cards of the same deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your minimum deck size is 85 cards. When you draw during the draw phase, draw 1 additional card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. House Clegane.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are running a character agenda or are not running an agenda, House Clegane Brigands gains: 'Response: After you win an Intrigue challenge, stand House Clegane Brigands.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to choose a character to claim 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.) Dominance: If you won dominance this phase, pay 1 gold to return Sitting the Iron Throne from your dead pile to your hand.

Discard up to 2 of those cards. Put the remaining cards back on the top of the deck in any order.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Deepwood Motte to discard the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck (any player may discard 1 power from his or her House card to cancel this effect). If 2 or more non-character cards are discarded in this way, choose and stand a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a non-unique non-limited location. Take control of attached location and discard all other attachments attached to it.

property.value: Response: After Dale Seaworth enters play or leaves play, choose and return 1 Baratheon card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.value: Challenges: Kneel White Harbor to choose a character controlled by an opponent with 6 or more power on his or her House card. Until the end of the phase, that caracter cannot be saved and ignores any effect that would make it 'cannot be killed.'

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. During Intrigue challenges against you, your characters with a Military icon gain an Intrigue icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Planky Town Orphan from your hand, reveal the top card as your next action this phase. Otherwise, return it to the top of your deck.

property.value:
If you are running a non-character agenda, treat Ser Cletus Yronwood's printed text box as if it were blank.

property.value: Response: After Blood Magic Ritual comes out of Shadows, choose a non-Army character in your dead pile and put it into play. Attach Blood Magic Ritual to it. If Blood Magic Ritual leaves play kill attached character.

(Counts as a Condition attachment with the text, 'Pay the printed gold cost of the attached card to put it into play as your Shadows action. If Guided by Quaithe becomes unattached, return attached card to it's owners hand if it is still in Shadows.'

property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Dagger Lake Galley to choose a unique character you control. That character gains a Naval enhancement on the icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

property.value: Response: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a Holy character to cancel a triggered effect that would cause a player to draw 1 or more cards. Instead, you draw that number of cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Nurtured by the Crone cannot be cancelled.

property.value: If you have more than 1 opponent and Aurane Waters would be killed or discarded from play, instead Aurane Waters is added to the title pool (limit 1 per title pool). property.name: Text
property.value:
You may discard an event card attached to Ten Towers Longship to play it as if it was in your hand. Then, place that event on the bottom of its owners deck.
Response: After you win a challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel Ten Towers Longship to choose an event card in the losing opponent's discard pile. Attach that event card to Ten Towers Longship.

property.value: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Longship Nightflyer to have the losing opponent choose and discard a card from his or her hand.

property.value: Challenges: Until the end of the phase, when a player loses a challenge, he or she must choose a location he or she controls and return it to its owner's hand.

property.value: House Greyjoy only. Play before any challenges have been declared this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to attach Venomous Manticore to a character (counts as a Creature attachment with the text 'Attached character gets -1 STR. Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to attach Venomous Manticore to another eligible character').

property.name: House
property.value: Baratheon. Lannister.

property.name: Traits

property.value: Response: After you declare Randyll Tarly as an attacker, choose any number of house Tyrell characters to gain vigilant until the end of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose a card you control that is currently in play with the Shadow crest and return it to Shadows.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Mercenary. Traitor.

property.name: Text
property.value: If The Tattered Prince would be killed, instead attach him to your House card as your only agenda with the text, 'Ignore all gold penalties when playing out-of-House Mercenary characters. Lower the cost of the first Mercenary character you play each round by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a Holy character to choose up to 3 cards in any player's discard and dead piles and shuffle them into his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a Holy character to choose up to 2 locations with a total printed cost of 2 or less in your discard pile and put them into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a Holy character to save a unique character you control from being killed (any player may discard 3 power from his or her House to cancel this effect). Then, search your deck for a copy of that character and attach it as a duplicate and shuffle your deck.
